description: Main source file for a Flutter-based finance tracking app. Contains app initialization, navigation, authentication flow, dashboard, transactions, budgeting, and analytics screens, along with their associated logic and UI components.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the app theme and navigation.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Handles routing between login, registration, and main app depending on auth state.

classes.name: _AuthNavigationState
classes.description: State management for authentication flow, toggling between login and register views.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app shell with bottom navigation bar for different primary screens.

classes.name: _MainScaffoldState
classes.description: State class managing tab selection and navigation logic.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: UI for user login with form and validation.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class for handling login form, submission, and loading states.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: UI for user registration with form validation and confirmation.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State class for handling registration logic, form validation, and user feedback.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions, summary, and navigation to add new transactions.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: Logic for fetching transactions, handling refresh, and navigation.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Lists all transactions with options to add, edit, or delete.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: Manage transactions list, fetch data, delete flow with confirmation dialog.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing a transaction, with date picker and validation.

classes.name: _TransactionEditScreenState
classes.description: Maintain form state, handle save/update, and date picking.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Displays list of budgets per category, fetched from service.

classes.name: _BudgetsScreenState
classes.description: Manage budget data fetching and display.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Shows analytics with category spending breakdown and instructions.

classes.name: _ChartsScreenState
classes.description: Fetch and display analytics data and charts.

methods.name: runApp
methods.description: Flutter method to run the app with the root widget.

methods.name: _checkAuth
methods.description: Checks user authentication status on startup.

methods.name: _onAuthenticated
methods.description: Callback invoked when user successfully authenticates.

methods.name: _onSwitchToRegister
methods.description: Switches view from login to registration.

methods.name: _onSwitchToLogin
methods.description: Switches view from registration to login.

methods.name: _onLogout
methods.description: Logs the user out and resets navigation.

methods.name: _onNavTapped
methods.description: Handles bottom navigation tab tap to switch screens.

methods.name: _goToAddTransaction
methods.description: Navigates to the transaction creation screen.

methods.name: _deleteTx
methods.description: Deletes a transaction after confirmation dialog.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens date picker dialog for transaction date.

methods.name: _fetchBudgets
methods.description: Fetches budget data for budgets screen.

methods.name: _fetchAnalytics
methods.description: Fetches analytics data for charts screen.
